articles.author: Susanne Barton, Tom Metcalf
articles.title: Barclays to Cut More Than 100 Investment Banking Roles, Sky Says - Bloomberg
articles.description: Barclays Plc will cut about 100 roles in its investment banking group, as the slowdown in dealmaking and capital-markets businesses continues.
articles.content:
Barclays Plc will cut about 100 roles in its investment banking group, as the slowdown in dealmaking and capital-markets businesses continues. 
Conversations with affected staff are set to take plac… [+108 chars]
